location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: PZ 7248/33 'Persian Gulf: Jewish school at Bushire; q[uestio]n of financial assistance from Anglo-Jewish Association'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description (used for referencing) commences at f 42, and terminates at f 55, as it is part of a larger physical volume; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: Thefile contains correspondence regarding a request by the Jewish community inBushire for assistance in funding a school, and the consideration of thisrequest by the Anglo-Jewish Association. The primary correspondents are:Secretary, Anglo-Jewish Association; Colonial Office; Political Resident,Persian Gulf.
